body.name: Smart Watch (Answer/Dial Call), 1.91" Full Touch Screen Smart Watch for Android & iOS Phones with Heart Rate & Sleep Monitor,Multi-Sport Modes,Voice Assistant,Fitness Smart Watch for Women Men
features: 【Bluetooth Call and Message Notification】Stay connected with Bluetooth call functionality and receive all of your important messages and notifications with message push. Keep track of your daily activities with motion recording, which includes step counting, distance tracking, and calorie counting.

【1.91'' Large Screen Smart Watch and Customize Watch Face】With a sleek 1.91 inch, IPS high-definition large screen display, you can easily view all of your important information at a glance. The smart watch app contains more than 200+ online watch faces of different styles, as well as DIY your watch faces. Choose your favorite photos as watch faces to show your personality.

【All-rounded Health Monitoring】With heart rate monitoring and sleep monitoring, you can track your overall health and make sure you're getting enough rest.And with blood oxygen saturation measurement, stopwatch function, sedentary reminder and drinking water reminder you can monitor your body's vital signs in real-time.

【Multi-Sport Modes and Fitness Tracker】Whether you're into running, cycling, or swimming, or do other sports, this smart watch has multiple sports modes to help you track your progress and reach your fitness goals. The powerful health algorithm can accurately monitor and analyze multiple data points, like step, distance, calorie burned, making your workouts more efficient.

【Wide Compatibility and IP68 Waterproof and Other Features】The Smart watch is compatible with smart phone of Android 5.0 and IOS 9.0 above version. Equipped with 230mAH battery, the watch can lasts 5-7 daily using and 30-day standby. This fitness watch comes with IP68 and 5 ATM ratings for water resistance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: POWERFUL FUNCTIONS Health: 24/7 Heart Rate monitor, Blood oxygen sensor, Sleep tracker, Breathe, Drink water reminder, Reminder to move, Support health APP. Life Assistant: Bluetooth Answer Call, Bluetooth Dial Call, Messages Reminder, Alarm clock, Timer, Weather, Music remote, Camera remote, Find phone, Calculator, Dynamic watch face, watch face market (130+ watch faces), custom watch faces(you can set the picture you like as the watch face), Set the screen off time, Do not disturb mode. Built-in calculators, 5 User Interface. Sports: All-Day Activity Tracking( Steps, calories, distance ), IP68 waterproof, Multi Exercise Modes, Sports Data Report.

Ai Voice Assistant It is a watch and your smart assistant. Touch the voice assistant and wake up the intelligent voice,on call, intelligent life accompany with you. Remote Camera Control you phone camera to photo the wonderful moment on your journey. Long Battery Life 230mAh battery capacity. One full battery life. Get rid of frequent charging problem.

Weather Display Real-time understanding of temperature changes, timely response to severe weather, you can know by looking at your watch. Music Control Raise your hand to control music playback when your phone is not around. Standard Size. The band adjustable length is from 155mm to 235mm. It can be suitable for all kind of different weights people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality smart watch
reviews.reviewText: I needed a watch to count my steps/heart rate and use at work for controlling audio plus checking time. I like the price and options on this one so gave it a try. So far a couple of days in and I'm really happy with this smart watch. The look is simple and the feel of the watch on my wrist is good so far. Also, the wrist band seems easy to change to a new one if needed. Step count is working and has so many features that I am just getting used to. The app is very easy to use and allows me to change the phone face to anything basically. The heart rate monitor is pretty acurate as I took my heart rate in a minute and watch was only off a heart beat so I'm happy with that. I have use this on my long walks to keep a check on my heart rate and step count. The features are many and have not used them all as I'm still getting used to the watch. Overall I am very happy with my purchase and for the price, it's an awesome deal. I will update once I have use this watch for a longer period. I would recommend this smart watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch & customer service
reviews.reviewText: I was having issues with my 1st watch, so customer service walked me thru steps and even sent me step by step videos how to fix issues. It enemded up the phone speaker was defective, so the immediately sent out a new one and it works great. Super happy with this watch and company all around. I will never buy an expensive smart watch again. The one works like an apple watch without the price. So happy I took a chance. My friends are going to be so jealous.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Watch for the price.
reviews.reviewText: It works great for tracking steps, sleep, and the battery life is good. I also like the various face/background options. I only wish I could get better distance away from my phone. Just going from one floor to the next, it disconnects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s an amazing value for the price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The watch is good looking and not heavy. The band is simple but well made. Battery lasts over a day. Has many functions and multiple faces. Definitely a good purchase for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the that I can keep track of my walking. Unable to get calls directly.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It easy to set up . And very convenient using .
reviews.reviewText: The best smartwatch ever. East to use . I like it so much so I bought 4 more and give it as a gift to my relatives. Very satisfying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks better than it works
reviews.reviewText: I got this watch because of it's many, many features. This watch is like having your phone on your wrist, the only problem is that the first day I set up the watch everything notification I set worked. On day two I had to do a reset and now none of my notification features are working. I even got exceptional help from the IT dept. Unfortunately, I have to send the watch back, because what's the point of have a smart watch and all the features not work.😔
